readme:
Receive a notification when your Facebook Ads balance drops below a set limit.  
![notification.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/notification_73fbbbedda.png)

### How it works

![Screenshot 20250218 085635.jpg](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_02_18_085635_b057f8f2f3.jpg)  
There are two methods to determine your available balance, depending on your account's billing setup.

This template gives you both methods, so you can choose the one that best fits your situation.

You can also replace the Telegram node with another chat app, like **WhatsApp** , Slack, Discord, Twilio or even Email.

### Who is this template for?

Marketing professionals who want to automate low balance notifications, so they don’t have to check their balance all the time.

### How to set up

All information you need to set up this workflow is already inside the template.

### Check out my other templates

👉 [**https://n8n.io/creators/solomon/**](https://n8n.io/creators/solomon/)
readme_zh:
当您的Facebook广告余额低于设定限额时接收通知。  
![notification.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/notification_73fbbbedda.png)

### 工作原理

![Screenshot 20250218 085635.jpg](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_02_18_085635_b057f8f2f3.jpg)  
根据账户的账单设置，有两种方法可确定可用余额。

本模板提供两种方法，您可根据实际情况选择最适合的方式。

您还可以将Telegram节点替换为其他通讯应用，如**WhatsApp**、Slack、Discord、Twilio，甚至电子邮件。

### 适用对象

希望实现余额不足通知自动化的营销专业人士，无需频繁手动检查账户余额。

### 设置方法

模板内已包含配置该工作流所需的全部信息。

### 探索更多模板

👉 [**https://n8n.io/creators/solomon/**](https://n8n.io/creators/solomon/)
